Plot: Emmaline Grant has always loved romance, so it's really no surprise that she has found her calling as a wedding florist. And she gets to work with her best friends Mackensie, Parker and Laurel - she couldn't ask for a better job. Yet while men swarm around her, she still hasn't found Mr Right.
Characters: Mackensie "Mac" Elliot, Jackson "Jack" Cooke, Parker Brown, Laurel McBane, Emmaline "Emma" Grant
